I remember looking into her eyes...
...and feeling like our lives would always be connected from that moment on.
It was this strange in sync connection that was overwhelming.
And I remembered feeling like this person...
...is going to be an important person in my life.
There was not a doubt in my mind that she would be the girl that I'd marry someday.
This is really surreal right now.
...and the love of my life just proposed to me.
